abstract: Also, how Joel I. Klein became Rupert Murdoch’s legal compass, and remembering the man behind many of the most popular TV game shows.
snippet: Also, how Joel I. Klein became Rupert Murdoch’s legal compass, and remembering the man behind many of the most popular TV game shows.
lead_paragraph: In an example of China’s growing attention on the global film industry, the Wanda Group, one of that country’s largest theater owners, is said to be in talks to buy a significant stake — or acquire outright — AMC Entertainment, which owns the second-largest movie theater chain in North America. If the deal is completed, Michael Cieply and Brooks Barnes write, Wanda would be “the first theater chain to have a commanding presence in the world’s two largest movie markets.”

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: Chinese Interest in Movie Theaters, and the Beatles on TV
